sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>login.failed</event_name><name>SNC User Lockout Check with Auto Unlock</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[//
// Check to see if the user has failed to login too many times
// when the limit is reached, lock the user out of the system.
// Also create a trigger to unlock the user after 'N' minutes.
//

lockoutOnFailedLogin();

function lockoutOnFailedLogin() {
	var maxUnlockAttempts = gs.getProperty("glide.user.max_unlock_attempts", 5);
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
	if (gr.get("user_name", event.parm1.toString())) {
		if (gr.failed_attempts > maxUnlockAttempts)
			return;

		gr.failed_attempts += 1;
		if (gr.failed_attempts > maxUnlockAttempts) {
			gr.locked_out = true;
			gr.update();
			gs.log("User " + event.parm1 + " locked out due to too many invalid login attempts");
			triggerUnlock(gr.sys_id);
		} else {
			gr.update();       
		}
	}
}

function triggerUnlock(userSysID) {
	var unlockIn = gs.getProperty("glide.user.unlock_timeout_in_mins", 15);
	var trigger = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger");
	trigger.name = "Unlock the user after "+ unlockIn + " mins";
	trigger.next_action = getTriggerTime(unlockIn);
	trigger.job_id.setDisplayValue('RunScriptJob');
	trigger.script = getTriggerScript(userSysID);
	trigger.document = 'sys_user';
	trigger.document_key = userSysID;
	trigger.state = 0;
	trigger.trigger_type = 0;
	trigger.insert();
}

function getTriggerScript(userSysID) {
	var ret = ""
	+ "var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');\n"
	+ "gr.addQuery('sys_id', '" +userSysID+ "');\n"
	+ "gr.addQuery('locked_out', true);\n"
	+ "gr.query();\n"
	+ "if (gr.next()) {\n"
		+ "gr.locked_out = false;\n"
		+ "gr.failed_attempts = 0;\n"
		+ "gr.update();\n"
		+ "gs.log('Auto-unlocking user '+gr.name);\n"
	+ "} else {\n"
		+ "gs.log('Unable to auto-unlock user with sys_id: "+userSysID+"');\n"
	+ "}";
	return ret;
}

function getTriggerTime(minutesToAdd) {
	var checkTime = new GlideDateTime(/*now*/);
	checkTime.addSeconds(minutesToAdd * 60);
	return checkTime;
}
]]></script><synchronous>true</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-08-24 00:27:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNC User Lockout Check with Auto Unlock</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">cda23fa288d22210559020d480f9d272</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>developer.program.hop@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-01 22:22:46</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>Allow write for knowledge in incident when incident_state is closed/canceled, for users with role nobody.</description><local_or_existing/><name>incident.knowledge</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = true;
if ((current.incident_state == IncidentState.CLOSED || current.incident_state == IncidentState.CANCELED) && !gs.hasRole('nobody')) {
	answer = false;
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-14 10:01:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>0527cdceb7522010eeafbc16de11a970</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incident.knowledge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Incident Management Best Practice - Kingston" source="com.snc.best_practice.incident.kingston">07663f6688162210559020d480f9d237</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_0527cdceb7522010eeafbc16de11a970</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-26 06:46:13</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

restrictedtruefalseon_desktopfalsefalse95fc11615f1211001c9b2572f2b477c60523da512c611228900811a37c97c20141970-01-03 00:00:00Service category requests enable creation and publishing of services for:

  • Inquiry
  • Request / Fullfill (ask for something, receive it)
  • Purchase items on behalf of the organization

By filling out this request, you or your designate will be the manager of the service category. You can assign editors or delegate / give manager authority to anyone in your department.

Once this request is approved, you will be notified via email and sent a link to begin creating your services. You will also be sent a link to the request table associated with the service requests.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description/><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>8040335aa3a30210e9715824d51e6122</name><operation display_value="execute">execute</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = gs.getSession().isLoggedIn();
if (!answer) {
    answer = gs.getProperty('glide.security.allow_unauth_roleless_acl', false);
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-24 21:42:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>33333f1ea3a30210e9715824d51e61d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>8040335aa3a30210e9715824d51e6122</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Operations Workspace ITSM Common" source="sn_sow_itsm_common">0eef12637311301045216238edf6a75e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Service Operations Workspace ITSM Common">0eef12637311301045216238edf6a75e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_33333f1ea3a30210e9715824d51e61d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-26 07:24:50</sys_updated_on><type display_value="ux_data_broker">6d9c40e9531210101cb3ddeeff7b12f6</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_925ff5fbc3333010a282a539e540dd6c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition table="incident.knowledge">caller_id=javascript:gs.getUserID()^ORopened_by=javascript:gs.getUserID()^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>Allow write for knowledge in incident, if the ACL script returns true, and if the ACL condition (caller_id=javascript:gs.getUserID()^ORopened_by=javascript:gs.getUserID()^EQ) evaluates to true.</description><local_or_existing/><name>incident.knowledge</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = true;
if ((current.incident_state == IncidentState.CLOSED || current.incident_state == IncidentState.CANCELED) && !gs.hasRole('nobody')) {
	answer = false;
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-20 10:20:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>925ff5fbc3333010a282a539e540dd6c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incident.knowledge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Incident Management Best Practice - Kingston" source="com.snc.best_practice.incident.kingston">07663f6688162210559020d480f9d237</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_925ff5fbc3333010a282a539e540dd6c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-26 06:46:12</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e10020e883332210bd2aa730ceaad3a7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil = Class.create();
RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.answer = [];
    },


    /**
     * @param {object} data in the below format
     * {
     *  "sourceInstance": sufffix for the source instance
     * }
     * 
     */
    getCompletedUpdateSetsFromSource: function(sourceInstance, updateSetIDs) {
        var log1 = "RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil:: getCompletedUpdateSetsFromSource(), sourceInstance: " + sourceInstance + " updateSetIDs: " + updateSetIDs;
        gs.log(log1);
        this.answer.push(log1);
        var id, gr = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set_source');
        gr.addQuery('name', sourceInstance); //name of the source environment, where actual update sets are available
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next())
            id = gr.getUniqueValue();
        var worker = new GlideUpdateSetWorker();
        worker.setBackground(true);
        worker.setUpdateSourceSysId(id);
        worker.setLimitSet(updateSetIDs.toString());
        worker.start();
        var progress_id = worker.getProgressID();
        var progress = GlideRecord('sys_progress_worker');
        for (var i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
            gs.sleep(1000);
            progress.get(progress_id);
            log1 = "RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil:: getCompletedUpdateSetsFromSource() , state: " + progress.state + " , progress_id: " + progress_id + " Poll Number: " + i;
            gs.info(log1);
            this.answer.push(log1);
            if (progress.state == 'complete')
                break;
        }
        return progress_id;
    },


    //OPTIONAL if you have auto preview enabled
    //Auto preview loaded update sets
    AutoPreviewUpdateSets: function(updateSetNames, conflictsResolutionValue) {
        //Query the remote update sets
        if (gs.nil(updateSetNames))
            return;

        var remote_updateset = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
        remote_updateset.addQuery('sys_class_name=sys_remote_update_set^nameIN' + updateSetNames);
        remote_updateset.query();
        this.answer.push("Number of update sets found during AutoPreview:" + remote_updateset.getRowCount());
        while (remote_updateset.next()) {
            if (!remote_updateset.sys_id.nil()) {
                //update state of selected update sets to preview
                if (remote_updateset.state == 'loaded') { //eliminate invalid status
                    remote_updateset.state = "previewed";
                    remote_updateset.update();
                    // run previwer job
                    var t = new UpdateSetPreviewer();
                    t.removePreviewRecords(remote_updateset.sys_id);
                    t.generatePreviewRecords(remote_updateset.sys_id);
                }
            }

            if ((conflictsResolutionValue == "ignored" || conflictsResolutionValue == "skipped") && GlidePreviewProblemHandler.hasUnresolvedProblems(remote_updateset.sys_id)) {
                this.answer.push("Update sets conflicts found");
                this.resolveConflicts(remote_updateset.sys_id, conflictsResolutionValue);
            }
        }
    },


    // Resolved the preview/conflict errors with given resolution value
    resolveConflicts: function(remoteUpdateSetSysId, conflictsResolutionValue) {

        var problemResolutionGr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_preview_problem");
        problemResolutionGr.addEncodedQuery("remote_update_set=" + remoteUpdateSetSysId);
        problemResolutionGr.query();

        while (problemResolutionGr.next()) {
            problemResolutionGr.setValue("status", conflictsResolutionValue); // ignored = "Accept remote update" & skipped = "Skip remote update"
            problemResolutionGr.update();
        }
    },


    //Commit previewed updates 
    commitRemoteUpdateSets: function(updateSetNames) {
        if (gs.nil(updateSetNames))
            return;
		var worker = new GlideUpdateSetWorker();
        var remote_updateset = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
        remote_updateset.addQuery('sys_class_name=sys_remote_update_set^nameIN' + updateSetNames);
        remote_updateset.query();
		this.answer.push("Query for commitRemoteUpdateSets"+remote_updateset.getEncodedQuery()+" count "+remote_updateset.getRowCount());
        while (remote_updateset.next()) {

            if (!remote_updateset.sys_id.nil() && remote_updateset.state == 'previewed') {
                var log2 = "commitRemoteUpdateSets count: " + remote_updateset.sys_id.nil() + "  issues: " + GlidePreviewProblemHandler.hasUnresolvedProblems(remote_updateset.sys_id);
                gs.info(log2);
                this.answer.push(log2);
                //check updateset issues are fixed
                if (!GlidePreviewProblemHandler.hasUnresolvedProblems(remote_updateset.sys_id)) {
                    var sys_up_set = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
                    var local_sys_id = worker.remoteUpdateSetCommit(sys_up_set, remote_updateset, remote_updateset.update_source.url);
                    log2 = "commitRemoteUpdateSets , local_sys_id " + local_sys_id + " remote_updateset.sys_id: " + remote_updateset.sys_id;
                    gs.info(log2);
                    this.answer.push(log2);
                    var xml_gr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_xml");
                    xml_gr.addQuery("remote_update_set", remote_updateset.sys_id);
                    xml_gr.query();
					this.answer.push("Query for commiting update sets (sys_update_xml): "+xml_gr.getEncodedQuery()+" , count: "+xml_gr.getRowCount());
                    //execute commit and XML installtion
                    while (xml_gr.next()) {
                        var local_xml_gr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_xml");
                        local_xml_gr.initialize();
                        local_xml_gr.name = xml_gr.name;
                        local_xml_gr.payload = xml_gr.payload;
                        local_xml_gr.action = xml_gr.action;
                        local_xml_gr.type = xml_gr.type;
                        local_xml_gr.target_name = xml_gr.target_name;
                        local_xml_gr.view = xml_gr.view;
                        local_xml_gr.update_domain = xml_gr.update_domain;
                        local_xml_gr.table = xml_gr.table;
                        local_xml_gr.category = xml_gr.category;
                        local_xml_gr.application = xml_gr.application;
                        local_xml_gr.update_set = local_sys_id;
                        if (local_xml_gr.isValidField('replace_on_upgrade'))
                            local_xml_gr.replace_on_upgrade = xml_gr.replace_on_upgrade;
                        local_xml_gr.insert();
                    }
                    remote_updateset.update();
                    worker.setUpdateSetSysId(local_sys_id);
                    worker.setBackground(false);
					gs.log("Worker ProgressID: "+worker.getProgressID());
                    worker.start();
                }
            }
        }

        var progress_id = worker.getProgressID();
        var progressGr = GlideRecord('sys_progress_worker');
        for (var i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
            gs.sleep(1000);
            progressGr.get(progress_id);
            log2 = "RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil:: commitRemoteUpdateSets() , state: " + progressGr.state + " , progress_id: " + progress_id;
            gs.info(log2);
            this.answer.push(log2);
            if (progressGr.state == 'complete')
                break;
        }

    },


    cleanUpdateSets: function(updateSetNames) {

        // remove the local update sets in PDI
        var updateSetGr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_set");
        updateSetGr.addEncodedQuery("nameIN" + updateSetNames);
        updateSetGr.query();

        if (updateSetGr.next())
            updateSetGr.deleteMultiple();

        // remove the retrieved update sets in PDI
        var remoteUpdateSetGr = new GlideRecord("sys_remote_update_set");
        remoteUpdateSetGr.addQuery("nameIN" + updateSetNames);
        remoteUpdateSetGr.query();
        this.answer.push("Update sets to be cleaned:" + remoteUpdateSetGr.getRowCount());

        if (remoteUpdateSetGr.next())
            recordsDeleted = remoteUpdateSetGr.deleteMultiple();
    },
    getAuditLogs: function() {
        return this.answer;
    },
    type: 'RemoteUpdateSetsDeploymentUtil'

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_dd48a8e083372210bd2aa730ceaad3ca
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script><![CDATA[var origin = window.location.origin;
var redirectionLinkMap = {
    devStudio: origin +
        '/$studio.do?sysparm_transaction_scope=global&sysparm_nostack=true',
    aes: origin + '/now/appenginestudio/home',
    flowDesigner: origin + '/$flow-designer.do?sysparm_nostack=true#/',
    integrationHub: origin +
        '/$pa_dashboard.do?sysparm_dashboard=cd9daf050f1033002a56657eef767ea8',
    uiBuilder: origin + '/now/build/ui/experiences',
    processAutomationDesigner: 'https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/paris-servicenow-platform/page/administer/process-automation-designer/task/design-automated-process.html',
    mobileStudio: origin +
        '/$studio.do?sysparm_transaction_scope=global&sysparm_nostack=true',
    conversationalInterface: '',
    checkoutApi: 'https://developer.servicenow.com/dev.do#!/reference',
    readDocumentation: 'https://docs.servicenow.com/',
    creatorStudio: origin + '/now/creatorstudio/home',
};

function navigateToApplication(applicationName) {
    window.open(redirectionLinkMap[applicationName], '_blank');
}

function getResponse(response) {
    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
}

function trackClickEvents(propName) {
    var ga = new GlideAjax('DevUpdateTrackerClicks');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'triggerUpdateClickEvent');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_parm1', propName);
    ga.getXML(getResponse);
}]]></client_script><description/><direct>false</direct><endpoint/><html><![CDATA[<html lang="en" class="no-js">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <style>
        .content {
            max-width: 1440px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .pdi-homepage,
        .pdi-homepage * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        .pdi-homepage {
            background: #f5f6f7;
            height: 100%;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__frame-4 {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 8px;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            /* width: 694px; */
            /* position: absolute; */
            /* left: calc(50% - 347px); */
            top: 72px;
            position: relative;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__go-further {
            color: var(--text-default-text-tertiary, #36444b);
            text-align: left;
            font-family: var(--display-type-header-tertiary-font-family,
                    "OpenSans-Bold",
                    sans-serif);
            font-size: var(--display-type-header-tertiary-font-size, 16px);
            font-weight: var(--display-type-header-tertiary-font-weight, 700);
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: flex-start;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__power-your-workflow-applications {
            color: var(--text-default-text-primary, #10171b);
            text-align: center;
            font-family: var(--display-type-header-hero-font-family,
                    "OpenSans-Bold",
                    sans-serif);
            font-size: var(--display-type-header-hero-font-size, 32px);
            font-weight: var(--display-type-header-hero-font-weight, 700);
            position: relative;
            align-self: stretch;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__header {
            background: #002239;
            height: 430px;
            position: relative;
            right: 0px;
            left: -1.4210854715202004e-14px;
            /* top: 52px; */
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__frame-2 {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 16px;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            position: relative;
            /* left: calc(50% - 275px); */
            top: calc(50% - 95px);
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__creator-studio {
            color: var(--neutrals-neutral-0, #ffffff);
            text-align: left;
            font-family: var(--display-type-header-hero-font-family,
                    "OpenSans-Bold",
                    sans-serif);
            font-size: var(--display-type-header-hero-font-size, 32px);
            font-weight: var(--display-type-header-hero-font-weight, 700);
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: flex-start;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__frame-3 {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 24px;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__frame-1 {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 8px;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__create-request-based-apps-quickly {
            color: var(--neutrals-neutral-1, #f3f4f4);
            text-align: center;
            font-family: var(--display-type-header-tertiary-font-family,
                    "OpenSans-Bold",
                    sans-serif);
            font-size: var(--display-type-header-tertiary-font-size, 16px);
            font-weight: var(--display-type-header-tertiary-font-weight, 700);
            position: relative;
            align-self: stretch;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__a-guided-and-curated-environment-for-creating-forms-and-assigning-automations-to-them-no-code-required {
            color: var(--neutrals-neutral-2, #e5e6e7);
            text-align: center;
            font-family: var(--text-md-font-family, "OpenSans-Regular", sans-serif);
            font-size: var(--text-md-font-size, 16px);
            font-weight: var(--text-md-font-weight, 400);
            position: relative;
            width: 550px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

    <style>
        a,
        button,
        input,
        select,
        h1,
        h2,
        h3,
        h4,
        h5,
        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            border: none;
            text-decoration: none;
            background: none;

            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        }

        menu,
        ol,
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        button {
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        .pdi-homepage {
            overflow: auto;
        }


        /* Container for flexboxes */
        .pdi-home-row {
            padding: 0;
            margin: 0;
            list-style: none;
            /* border: 1px solid silver; */
            -ms-box-orient: horizontal;
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -moz-flex;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
        }

        .pdi-home-row {
            -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding-bottom: 36px;
        }

        .pdi-home-column {
            width: 45%;
            /* min-height: 430px; */
            /* margin: 0 auto; */
        }

        .pdi-homepage__illustration div {
            width: 50%;
        }

        @media screen and (max-width: 830px) {
            .pdi-home-column {
                width: 80%;
                /* min-height: 430px; */
                /* margin: 0 auto; */
            }
        }

        @media screen and (max-width: 1100px) {
            .pdi-homepage__illustration div {
                width: auto;
            }
        }


        /* .pdi-home-column:nth-child(odd) {
        margin: 32px auto;
    }

    .pdi-home-column:nth-child(even) {
        margin: auto 32px;
    } */

        /* .pdi-home-column:last-child {
        margin: auto 30px;
    } */

        body {
            padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .btn:focus {
            box-shadow: none !important;
        }

        .last-child {
            float: right;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__frame-12 div {
            white-space: nowrap;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
            overflow: hidden;
            @supports (-webkit-line-clamp: 2) {
                overflow: hidden;
                text-overflow: ellipsis;
                white-space: initial;
                display: -webkit-box;
                -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
                -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
            }
        }
    </style>


</head>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>system.upgraded</event_name><name>OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedbackUpdates</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Starting update of the OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedback table to populate the NLU Discovery Outcome field");
try {
	var api = new UpdateNLUDiscoveryOutcomes();
	api.updateNluDiscoveryOutcomes();
} catch (ex) {
	gs.info("Error running updateNluDiscoveryOutcomes() : " + ex.toString());
}

// Set this record to false so that it does not run again
var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
gr.addQuery("sys_id", "d28b5c06eb463010506f7558b552281f"); // Sysid of this record
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue("active", false);
	gr.update();
}

gs.info("Completed update of the OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedback table");

]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 16:46:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d28b5c06eb463010506f7558b552281f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedbackUpdates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">596e7fa288962210559020d480f9d20e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_d28b5c06eb463010506f7558b552281f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-26 07:24:50</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_230e0b2c53d942105c7d7dd0a0490ec6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script>event.parm1 == 'sn_sow_itsm_common'</condition_script><description/><event_name>plugin.upgraded</event_name><name>Expand list on landing page</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var ootbConfigs = {
    uxScreenRecord: ['b034cf7877410110c05d885d9f5a9912', 'cbc2f24977070110949878dabd5a9935'],
    uxApplicabilityM2MScreen: ['4f45f34a77010110c05d885d9f5a991e', 'f5e6f34a77010110c05d885d9f5a9905', '9df6f34a77010110c05d885d9f5a9912', 'b9e2f20577c30110949878dabd5a99f6'],
    uxApplicability: ['89080439c7003010202818b1c7c2603d', 'a9e74039c7003010202818b1c7c2605e', 'f8d78039c7003010202818b1c7c260ef', '907dfd0977c30110949878dabd5a9901'],
    users: ['46d44a23a9fe19810012d100cca80666', '5137153cc611227c000bbd1bd8cd2007', '681b365ec0a80164000fb0b05854a0cd']
};
var hideListOnLandingPagePropSysId = 'e02cea20e0910210f87715d33d78aa64';
var currentEventScriptActionSysId = '230e0b2c53d942105c7d7dd0a0490ec6';
gs.info('Executing script action - Expand list on landing page');

if (gs.getProperty('glide.ux.user_criteria_enabled') == 'true' && isActiveUsersForSOW(ootbConfigs)) {
    expandListOnLandingPage();
}
disableCurrentEventScriptAction();

function isActiveUsersForSOW(config) {
    var uxScreenRecordSysIds = config.uxScreenRecord;
    var uxApplicabilityM2MScreenSysIds = config.uxApplicabilityM2MScreen;
    var uxApplicabilitySysIds = config.uxApplicability;
    var ootbUsers = config.users;
    var appGr = new GlideRecord('sys_ux_applicability_m2m_screen');
    appGr.addActiveQuery();
    appGr.addQuery('screen', 'IN', uxScreenRecordSysIds);
    appGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'NOT IN', uxApplicabilityM2MScreenSysIds);
    appGr.query();
    while (appGr.next()) {
        uxApplicabilitySysIds.push(appGr.getValue('applicability'));
    }
    var userCriteria = [];
    var ucIncGr = new GlideRecord('sys_ux_criteria_m2m_inclusion');
    ucIncGr.addActiveQuery();
    ucIncGr.addQuery('applicability', 'IN', uxApplicabilitySysIds);
    ucIncGr.query();
    while (ucIncGr.next()) {
        var ucSysId = ucIncGr.getValue('user_criteria');
        if (userCriteria.indexOf(ucSysId) == -1) {
            userCriteria.push(ucSysId);
        }
    }
    var groupSysIds = [];
    var userSysIds = [];
    var ucGr = new GlideRecord('user_criteria');
    ucGr.addActiveQuery();
    ucGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', userCriteria);
    ucGr.query();
    while (ucGr.next()) {
        var users = ucGr.getValue('user');
        var groups = ucGr.getValue('group');
        if (users) {
            users = users.split(',');
            for (i = 0; i < users.length; i++) {
                var userSysId = users[i];
                if (userSysIds.indexOf(userSysId) == -1) {
                    userSysIds.push(userSysId);
                }
            }
        }
        if (groups) {
            groups = groups.split(',');
            for (i = 0; i < groups.length; i++) {
                var groupSysId = groups[i];
                if (groupSysIds.indexOf(groupSysId) == -1)
                    groupSysIds.push(groupSysId);
            }
        }
    }

    var userGroupGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
    userGroupGr.addQuery('user.active', true);
    userGroupGr.addQuery('group', 'IN', groupSysIds);
    userGroupGr.addQuery('user', 'NOT IN', ootbUsers);
    userGroupGr.setLimit(1);
    userGroupGr.query();
    if (userGroupGr.hasNext())
        return true;

    var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    userGr.addActiveQuery();
    userGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', userSysIds);
    userGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'NOT IN', ootbUsers);
    userGr.setLimit(1);
    userGr.query();
    if (userGr.hasNext())
        return true;

    return false;
}

function expandListOnLandingPage() {
    var pagePropGr = new GlideRecord('sys_ux_page_property');
    if (pagePropGr.get(hideListOnLandingPagePropSysId)) {
        pagePropGr.setValue('value', false);
        pagePropGr.update();
        gs.info('Setting value of UX page proerpty hideListOnLandingPage to false.');
    }
}

function disableCurrentEventScriptAction() {
    var eventScriptActionGr = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
    if (eventScriptActionGr.get(currentEventScriptActionSysId)) {
        eventScriptActionGr.setValue('active', false);
        eventScriptActionGr.update();
        gs.info('Disabling the script action as it should only run once.');
    }
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-29 12:03:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>230e0b2c53d942105c7d7dd0a0490ec6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Expand list on landing page</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Operations Workspace ITSM Common" source="sn_sow_itsm_common">0eef12637311301045216238edf6a75e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Service Operations Workspace ITSM Common">0eef12637311301045216238edf6a75e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_230e0b2c53d942105c7d7dd0a0490ec6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-26 06:49:56</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script><![CDATA[var origin = window.location.origin;
var redirectionLinkMap = {
    devStudio: origin +
        '/$studio.do?sysparm_transaction_scope=global&sysparm_nostack=true',
    aes: origin + '/now/appenginestudio/home',
    flowDesigner: origin + '/$flow-designer.do?sysparm_nostack=true#/',
    integrationHub: origin +
        '/$pa_dashboard.do?sysparm_dashboard=cd9daf050f1033002a56657eef767ea8',
    uiBuilder: origin + '/now/build/ui/experiences',
    processAutomationDesigner: 'https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/paris-servicenow-platform/page/administer/process-automation-designer/task/design-automated-process.html',
    mobileStudio: origin +
        '/$studio.do?sysparm_transaction_scope=global&sysparm_nostack=true',
    conversationalInterface: '',
    checkoutApi: 'https://developer.servicenow.com/dev.do#!/reference',
    readDocumentation: 'https://docs.servicenow.com/',
    creatorStudio: origin + '/now/creatorstudio/home',
	servicenowStudio: origin + '/now/servicenow-studio/home'
};

function navigateToApplication(applicationName) {
    window.open(redirectionLinkMap[applicationName], '_blank');
}

function getResponse(response) {
    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
}

function trackClickEvents(propName) {
    var ga = new GlideAjax('DevUpdateTrackerClicks');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'triggerUpdateClickEvent');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_parm1', propName);
    ga.getXML(getResponse);
}]]></client_script><description/><direct>false</direct><endpoint/><html><![CDATA[<html lang="en" class="no-js">

    <style>
        a,
        button,
        input,
        select,
        h1,
        h2,
        h3,
        h4,
        h5,
        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            border: none;
            text-decoration: none;
            background: none;

            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        }

        menu,
        ol,
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        button {
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        .pdi-homepage {
            overflow: auto;
        }


        /* Container for flexboxes */
        .pdi-home-row {
            padding: 0;
            margin: 0;
            list-style: none;
            /* border: 1px solid silver; */
            -ms-box-orient: horizontal;
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -moz-flex;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
        }

        .pdi-home-row {
            -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding-bottom: 36px;
        }

        .pdi-home-column {
            width: 45%;
            /* min-height: 430px; */
            /* margin: 0 auto; */
        }

        .pdi-homepage__illustration div {
            width: 50%;
        }

        @media screen and (max-width: 830px) {
            .pdi-home-column {
                width: 80%;
                /* min-height: 430px; */
                /* margin: 0 auto; */
            }
        }

        @media screen and (max-width: 1100px) {
            .pdi-homepage__illustration div {
                width: auto;
            }
        }


        /* .pdi-home-column:nth-child(odd) {
        margin: 32px auto;
    }

    .pdi-home-column:nth-child(even) {
        margin: auto 32px;
    } */

        /* .pdi-home-column:last-child {
        margin: auto 30px;
    } */

        body {
            padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .btn:focus {
            box-shadow: none !important;
        }

        .last-child {
            float: right;
        }

        .pdi-homepage__frame-12 div {
            white-space: nowrap;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
            overflow: hidden;
            @supports (-webkit-line-clamp: 2) {
                overflow: hidden;
                text-overflow: ellipsis;
                white-space: initial;
                display: -webkit-box;
                -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
                -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
            }
        }
    </style>


</head>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_ebaea1cf9cd25210f87722436a15f78b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>system.upgraded</event_name><name>Security fix for SC Shopping Cart Dep</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var scriptPrefix = "fix_security_issue_sc_shopping_cart_deprecated";
gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Started executing the script");
if (!(GlideCollisionDetector.get().containsKey("sp_widget_f3336978dbaca2007f3bf5131f9619ec")))
	addACLChecks();

gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Ended executing the script");

function addACLChecks() {
var script = "(function() {
 var m = data.msgs = {};
 m.createdMsg = gs.getMessage("Created");
 m.trackMsg = gs.getMessage("track using 'Requests' in the header or");
 m.clickMsg = gs.getMessage("click here to view");
 m.cartEmptiedMsg = gs.getMessage("Your cart has been emptied");
 m.itemRemovedMsg = gs.getMessage("has been removed from your cart");
 m.updatedMsq = gs.getMessage("Updated");

 m.quantityToMsg = gs.getMessage("quantity to");
 m.clearCartConfirmationMsg = gs.getMessage("Are you sure you want to empty your cart?");
 var userID = gs.getUser().getID();
 var cart = new SPCart(input.cartName, userID);
 if (input && input.action === "edit_item") {
 data.editVariablesModal = $sp.getWidget('widget-modal', {embeddedWidgetId: 'sp-variable-editor', embeddedWidgetOptions: {sys_id: input.itemID, table: "sc_cart_item", showItemTitle: true, isOrdering: true}});
 return;
 } if (input && input.action === "update_quantity") {
 var cartItemGR = new GlideRecord("sc_cart_item");
 if (cartItemGR.get(input.itemID) && cartItemGR.canWrite()) {
 cartItemGR.setValue("quantity", input.quantity);
 cartItemGR.update();
 } } if (input && input.action === "checkout") { cart.setSpecialInstructions(input.additionalDetails);
 cart.setRequestedFor(input.cart.requested_for);
 cart.setDeliveryAddress(input.deliverTo);
 var request = cart.placeOrder();
 data.requestData = { number: request.getValue("number"), table: request.getTableName(), sys_id: request.getUniqueValue() };
 cart.setSpecialInstructions("");
 cart.setRequestedFor(userID);
 cart.setDeliveryAddress("");
 } if (input && input.action === "remove_item") {
 var itemGR = new GlideRecord('sc_cart_item');
 if (itemGR.get(input.removeItemID) && itemGR.canDelete()) itemGR.deleteRecord();
 } if (input && input.action === "clear_cart") { cart.clearCart();
 } if (input && input.action === "save_cart") {
 var newCart = new SPCart(input.newCartName, userID);
 newCart.loadCart(cart.getCartID());
 } data.sys_properties = { twostep_checkout: gs.getProperty("glide.sc.checkout.twostep", "false") == 'true' };
 var cartID = cart.getCartID();
 data.saveCartModal = $sp.getWidget('widget-modal', {embeddedWidgetId: 'sc_save_bundle', embeddedWidgetOptions: {}});
 data.cart = cart.getCartObj();
 data.cartItems = cart.getItems();
 })();";

	var gr = new GlideRecord("sp_widget");
	if (gr.get("f3336978dbaca2007f3bf5131f9619ec")) {
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.setUseEngines(false);
		gr.setValue("script", script);
		gr.update();
	}

	var action = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
	if (action.get("ebaea1cf9cd25210f87722436a15f78b")) {
		action.setValue("active", false);
		action.update();
	}
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-12-10 12:56:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>ebaea1cf9cd25210f87722436a15f78b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Security fix for SC Shopping Cart Dep</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Service Catalog (do not activate...see plugin description)" source="com.glide.service-portal.service-catalog">d8e3f7aa88d22210559020d480f9d280</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_ebaea1cf9cd25210f87722436a15f78b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-26 07:24:51</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Security fix for SC Shopping Cart Dep

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_producer_48bcec40eb0311003623666cd206fe24
sys_update_xml.payload:
truefalseon_desktopfalsefalsee15706fc0a0a0aa7007fc21e1ab70c2f0523da512c611228900811a37c97c20141970-01-03 00:00:00Item Designer category requests allow you to request a new category within the catalog. Once created, you will be able to create and publish items that allow users to request products and services.

For each item, you will be able to define:

  • the questions the user must complete to submit the request
  • approvals that must be completed for the request to progress to fulfillment
  • at least 1 task that will be used to fulfill the request

By filling out this request, you or your designate will be the manager of the item designer category.  You can also assign editors who will also have permission to create/update items within this category.

Once this request is fulfilled and the category is created, you will be notified via email and sent a link to begin creating your items.

]]>non_zerofalsefalse0falsefalsefalseuse_desktop_pictureItem Designer Category Requestfalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalse700JavaScript: popupOpenStandard("com.glideapp.servicecatalog_cat_item_view.do?v=1&sysparm_id=48bcec40eb0311003623666cd206fe24&sysparm_preview=true", "summary");00e0d08b13c3330100c8b837659bba8fb4Request a category that you can use to create your own catalog itemsfalsefalsesc_cat_item_producernigel.bell2014-02-17 11:19:2248bcec40eb0311003623666cd206fe2415Item Designer Category Requestdc523b2288d22210559020d480f9d23aglobalsc_cat_item_producer_48bcec40eb0311003623666cd206fe24system2025-06-26 06:45:12sc_ic_category_request

var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
gr.addQuery("sys_id", "a58e03ca771a111059018f1a5b5a99f9");
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
    gr.setValue("active", false);
    gr.update();
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-04 08:39:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a58e03ca771a111059018f1a5b5a99f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Service catalog mobile upgrade</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Catalog for mobile" source="sn_scmobile">2263a68187032300e0ef0cf888cb0b3f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Service Catalog for mobile">2263a68187032300e0ef0cf888cb0b3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_a58e03ca771a111059018f1a5b5a99f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-26 06:48:48</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
